145287172.review:
Fun hack and slash roguelike with a simplistic yet varied form of combat, but definitely feels underwhelming for a game that recently left early access. What I mean by this is that after playing for 5 hours I had already been getting messages from the game saying I had gotten every single item for a specific rarity, after only really doing about 13 runs. If you're aware of how roguelikes go, even if you're pretty good at them, 13 runs is not a lot of runs whatsoever. 

On the more positive side, it is co-op and does make the experience feel really catered towards playing with friends when you actually ARE playing with friends. Enemy variety definitely exists, and I don't think I was ever in a position in which I was incapable of doing anything about my situation.

Weapon Variety and Combat

Weapon variety exists in a really broad manner in the form of 5 completely unique weapons with their own completely unique mechanics, with all but one feeling entirely viable and enjoyable to play with and build stats around. 
The two weapons though that really stuck out to me in terms of what the combat does really well and also does really poorly would be the staff and the hammer respectively. 
The staff allows you to build fully into your magic abilities and allows you to charge these attacks up incredibly quickly to actually push into the gameplay of a fully fledged mage, probably the most fun I've had is in this incredibly well thought out mechanic to create this kind of gameplay with the way combat works in this game. 
On the other hand, the heavy hammer, while i understand the point of it's design, is too sluggish in a game where you have to constantly be aggressive while weaving through enemy attacks and for the most part, trying to take as little damage as possible. The reason I comment on that specifically is because of the hammer's unique ability to have a 3 level charged combo, which realistically doesnt require you TO charge it, but if that's the case, I dont understand why it exists to begin with if it's not going to be usable for whatsoever if only to bait less experienced players into using something so lackluster that puts them at a disadvantage. I always love the idea of heavy weapons in any game I play, but this seriously misses the mark for an otherwise really polished set of weapons.

All in all, it's a great game that for whatever reason doesn't have a 4 player bundle, definitely worth it on sale to even play with friend's on steam's "online local play" system, but for something on par with Hades or even Gungeon, the scale is not there when it comes to items, maps, or unlockables. With that being said, it still does it's job as a 2D hack and slash roguelike with the very unique added bonus of being one of the few in this genre to have 4 player multiplayer.

145198669.review:
Крайне мало в наше время годных пиксельных игр, тем более рогаликов.
Однако, наткнувшись на эту игру и поиграв некоторое время, можно сказать, что игра того стоило.
Можно собираться компанией вплоть до 4-ох людей за раз, при этом в игре доступно на текущий момент шесть возможных классов, с различной прокачкой, которая анлокнется после дохода до определённого места.
Сами же локации сделаны преимущественно красиво, не вырвиглазно и всё предельно приятно. Единственное, это временами анимации выглядят не особо хорошими, однако только если прям зацикливаться и искать. В целом, игра интересная, по своему уникальная, с хорошим сюжетом, да и в целом приятная. Всем советую, кто любит рогалики и пиксельные игры.

145006539.review:
Definitely a rip-off of Hades, but a good one. Similar difficulty, no voice acting. Great soundtrack and aesthetic.

Addicting in a simplistic way; your run success depends on the luck of what Skills and Relics you get (specials and passive specials), and your ability to dodge hits. Same pseudo-permadeath mechanic as Hades---you get one life per run but you can accumulate permanent buffs. I find it hard, but fair. Not any worse than the typical roguelite. 

Worth the price. Fun game that doesn't take too much brainpower.

As it stands me and my friend have yet to beat the final boss once, but I hope that as this game becomes bigger, that there is more added to it. Would love to play this game for years to come.

144908186.review:
Ember Knight s'inspire largement d'Hades pour le côté rogue-lite et son gameplay plutôt nerveux.

Ici la nouveauté est qu'il est possible de jouer jusqu'à 4 en local ou en ligne. L'aventure propose de parcourir 5 niveaux et d'utiliser 6 armes différentes (et leurs variations) déblocables au fil des avancées. Du reste vous pourrez utiliser 2 aptitudes maximum lors de chaque run ainsi qu'une variété de reliques qui viendront booster vos capacités.

Les graphismes et les animations 2D sont propres, le bestiaire est assez varié, la bande son est correcte. Au final Ember Knights offre une prestation plus qu'honorable.

Après si vous êtes solo je conseille plutôt de vous orienter vers Hades si vous ne connaissez pas. Dans les autres cas Ember Knights pourra vous donner satisfaction ; particulièrement si vous pouvez y jouer à plusieurs.

Still playing through at the time of this writing, having completed the game multiple times on Doom Difficulty.

Wow, what a treat.  When I first played Hades I thought that it would be cool to have a multiplayer variant of the game.  I guess someone at Doom Turtle heard my mental anguish cause now we have this.

Pros:
-Skill Trees for weapons
-Unlockable Cosmetics via gameplay
-Challenging combat
-Rewarding gameplay and Skill/Relic Unlock System
-SPRITE ANIMATIONS
-Unique weapon/skill kits that can make for insane combos
-Endless Mode lets you straight up just farm Ember while still being The Ultimate Lifeform


Cons:
-Kinda wish that the Architect Energy (Difficulty Modifiers) had different weights to them.  Being unable to heal after a boss run shouldn't be the same value as spawning 120% more monsters. 

-Praxis is a prat.  Pratsis.


TL;DR: game gud play game now

144663823.review:
This game is basically Hades, so this review will just be me comparing it to that, but: [i]if you haven't gotten your fill of Hades, just play Hades instead[/i]. I also only had the chance to play single-player, so maybe the game is super-great with multi but idk.

I don't think the game has the staying power of Hades both due to the fact that there's no meaningful story or interesting progression as well as the fact that the "heat" system seems badly designed in comparison to the incremental rewards Hades would give you.

The game is technically much more challenging than Hades, which isn't a con, but it does make it harder to start a run knowing the effort that I'll have to put in. There's just so many enemies with low windups and ranged attacks that if you don't have a build with the damage to close down enemies quickly, you may find yourself dodging for significant portions of the fight even without any difficulty modifiers and this game isn't super forgiving about healing.

All-in-all, I'd recommend this game to anyone who is waiting for Hades 2 and otherwise not.

144553009.review:
1.0인데도 불구하고 이스터에그가 까지 알차게 준비 된 게임. 스테이지 이후 반복되는 무한모드의 변칙성 모두 만족스럽게 플레이 했습니다. 정말 오랜만에 제 값을 하는 정식 출시 게임이네요. 버그도 수리검의 텔레포트 기능 외에는 없었습니다. (라스트 보스 이동 연출 도중 텔레포트 하면 맵 밖을 벗어납니다.)

아쉬운 점.
- 플레이 중 약간의 끊김 현상. (멀티기준)
- 캐릭터 인식이 어렵다. 피아 식별 자체가 어려울 정도. 카메라 무빙이 캐릭터 중심인 것도 아니라서 캐릭터 놓치기 쉽상. (이펙트 많으면 더 어려운데 사실 아트 특성인지 이펙트 없어도 구분 힘듬.) 보라색 스킨이 있는 데 보라색 불꽃 이펙트를 사용하는 보스가 있다. 스킨들 중에 너무 비슷한 컬러가 다수 있다.
- UI 문제. 화면 하단에 플레이어 번호(입장 순서) 대로 정렬되는데 내가 몇 번인지에 따라 매번 확인해야하는 위치가 바뀌어 혼란을 줌. 게다가 2, 3번 플레이어의 경우 정보창이 투명도가 높은 상태(해당 위치에 플레이어가 있을 경우 플레이어 가시화를 위해 시스템적으로 투명도를 올린다.)인 경우가 대부분이라 여러모로 불편하다.
- 사용하는 버튼이 적다. 장점이기도 하나, 너무 적은 거 같기도.
- 로봇 보스. 이전 보스에 비해 너무 쉽다. 보스의 움직임이 적은 탓에 순간 폭딜로 없애버리기가 너무 쉽다.

이게 1.0이 맞나 싶을 정도로 완성도 높고 즐겁게 한 게임. 요소 하나 하나 정말 공들여 만든 게 느껴질 정도로 잘만들었습니다. 앞으로의 행보가 정말 기대됩니다.

144214907.review:
I love this game and it's fantastic. I've never written reviews so my writing will be poor but I will give it a go as I genuinely appreciate this game.

From having experience in an arsenal of unique genres and loads of MMOs and roguelites, I have to say I find the boss fights in this game very good. I genuinely think it's better than a lot of end-game MMO boss fights which is kind of ridiculous. They feel good to play, it can be difficult, it can be easier but never impossible and never annoying. It's not just random melee hits where the difficulty is a large number increase or whatever, just brilliant stuff.

I haven't once felt like I was too weak to advance forward, nor having played co-op, though only with one more person and not with a full party, I didn't find that it felt either too easy or too hard changing between solo and duo play. The balance feels quite nice as well going into the various classes, some are certainly more powerful due to the nature these types of games play out and not necessarily due to balancing error. 

For example, I'd argue the range classes in this game are superior but the biggest reason lies mainly in the fact that they are ranged and not that they are just stronger. The nature of the game is that there are enemies that are ranged and enemies that are melee, if you are range you're mainly only vulnerable to one of these but if you're melee you're within attack range of both of the opposing enemy types. Naturally a ranged class has the advantage in such situations therefore I find them to be stronger and usually is the case in a lot of these games. 

From my experience, if melee is relevant it's usually because there balance is poor and they are just too strong, however in this game I find melee feels just as strong as the ranged classes and in some cases they are better because some skills benefit you from being close up, plus all melee having natural cleave in their hits allow them to easily negate the disadvantage from being in the range of two enemy types rather than one.

I also want to mentions the power-ups in this game, as with any roguelite game, basically shape and balance the whole thing. I'm sure there are perfect builds you can strive for, but I feel like even if you were only given (subjective) subpar options, you can still perform just fine, of course, combining these power-ups with things that could synergize will certainly make you stronger too. Additionally, while there are clear intended builds that are made to fit together in the game, you don't need to collect them all to be strong. You can mismatch between these intended builds just fine and depending on what skills you WANT to play (which is important because you don't feel obligated to pick any specific skills here, whichever you WANT to play is going to be the best in my opinion) you can build around it and you'll definitely be able to clear the game. 

I feel like in these times of games where there's a lot of rather unremarkable games I happened to randomly stumble upon this gem and I'm going to keep enjoying it for a while. If you want to play roguelites, especially a co-op one this is a must try!

144174344.review:
[b]This is a great game for the first 10-15 hours and even better coop. Outside of that it's a 6/10.[/b]

I've play both solo and with a friend and managed to beat the last boss a few time and even make good progress in the endless mode. It's easily worth $20 and an even better deal when it eventually goes on sale. 

The major drawback I've noticed in my time with the game is the balance of the various modifiers. Most don't scale well into endless mode and the handful that do are essential for a good run. Additionally, some of the modifiers are so good that not getting them feels bad, for example, heal on crit. The game feels like it was balanced to some earlier point, likely before they added the later worlds and especially not endless mode. Which, is disappointing because I was have good fun with the game until I realized my dream of tearing through endless mode was entirely dependent on finding one specific modifier.

Anyway, I had great fun and for anyone looking to have a great time with friends for 10ish hours, I highly recommend the game.

144110912.review:
看了一下评论，好像都玩的比较少。我是从刚上线测试就开始玩的，到现在也就100小时。游戏经历了好几次大改，各项设定也基本平稳。游戏基础的内容我就不多说，主要还是想说说最近现在版本的一些问题。
先说武器：作为一个从头跟到现在的玩家，我尝试过所有武器的历代玩法。从最初的慢速弓箭手，到无限跳锤，再到现在的镰刀一哥。
目前的武器里，法师、飞轮、锤子这三个的游戏体验都不好，        法师的问题在于目前没有一个核心的主力技能，曾经的毒矛很强，现在已经砍废了。飞轮打单体弹射次数多伤害很高，但是打不了群怪，喷火、炸弹、钻头、电阵这些都不够强。更不用说刷新技能还要大量圣物的支持，技能断档时间太长。          锤子目前最大的问题就是攻速太慢，上了噩梦之后，这个抬手速度会让你特别容易挨打。而且锤子的伤害和别的近战没有太大区别，攻速慢伤害还没优势。飞轮的问题在于没有平A没有群攻，飞轮的手长和近战类似，但每次只能打一个，我都不知道要怎么面对噩梦那满图的怪？？
接下来说说战士和弓箭手，目前弓箭手和战士都是可以当主C的。先讲弓箭手：主C的弓箭手核心技能是散射箭，有了这个技能才能打群怪。而且弓箭手由于有一个挂DEBUFF的武器技能，还可以当辅助。（目前版本唯一辅助）难点是前期伤害低，打一周目没好圣物和属性石支持的时候非常难打，噩梦无尽模式尤甚。       而战士现在版本的几个技能都很不错，火刀，额外圣物，攻击打掉远程攻击都很强（除了激光都能打掉），特别是无尽模式下，每一关都多个圣物优势极大（不过是随机的，有时候总给一些垃圾圣物）
最后讲讲正式版的新武器：镰刀哥。版本第一主C，强到爆炸！全能王！首先是普通攻击范围比战士大，而且打苹果会变成一个加1攻击的果子（超模核心）蓄力攻击为远程可选冰冻或是禁锢特效，命中后会破甲，还给自身加移速。蓄力可以储存，最多三发一起释放，后期超高爆发，一次打掉BOSS两个阶段都没问题。
武器说完就差不多了，圣物在游戏当中的作用更多是功能性，加BUFF、控场、特效等，伤害圣物都很弱（除了之前的蓄力毒法师玩法，现在已经砍掉了），技能也是功能性为主（现在没有好的输出技能），版本好用的技能：骰子、冲锋、冰甲、隐身。
最后说说游戏机制，由于有属性石的存在，提升自己的最好方法就是加属性，所以核心就是圣物头盔：每杀4个怪加1点攻击。当你打到噩梦之后，开局必去商店刷一个出来，否则根本没的打。而圣物王冠：技能杀死怪加1技能伤害，由于技能伤害和使用次数的拉胯，你很难用技能杀怪去叠这个，所以法师现在没的玩。

总之，好游戏。但是还能再调整和丰富，希望开发者能调整弱势武器在噩梦难度下的拉胯表现，以及技能和圣物的实用性。技能刷新机制和伤害提升手段的欠缺让法师在噩梦可以说是真噩梦了。怀念昙花一现的蓄力毒法师，那才是真法爷！

144108805.review:
有玩過Hades的應該會在這款遊戲發現大量的相似之處，純粹以多人遊戲而言，Ember knight 還算是不錯的遊戲，但如果是想體驗一款傑出的「Roguelike」遊戲，那我真的不推薦。

先說優點，操作這部分是真的不錯，遊戲的節奏整體偏快，所以造就了不錯的豪爽戰鬥體驗
美術也很有特點，甚至過場動畫也很有看點
大量的聖物，共86種，以及6種武器可以客製化

再來是缺點，這些我已經覺得可以直接把優點全部蓋過去了

聖物可以說是這遊戲的大重點，全部86種聖物但有45個是透過解鎖獲得，過程還不短，而且越後面的解鎖越是流派的重點，也就是說你打了將近快15或20個小時，你才終於摸到流派的完全體，這款的劇情沒啥重點，所以你可以想像這之間的過程有多無聊，沒有新的解鎖，沒新內容，同樣的敵人，過程就只是做同樣的事，沒有朋友一起打這中間的過程真的是作業感很重。

再來說說敵人，前3區域的敵人還算可以，熟不熟的問題，但第4區域真的是糞的可怕，敵人的傷害除了很高以外，而且攻擊的範圍偏大，再加上地形的狹窄以及電纜在旁邊搞事，讓整個第4區域真的是糞的完全體，容錯率低然後因為地形導致你會打的很彆扭。
也間接造成就算這遊戲有86個聖物，可是也沒幾個流排/聖物有出頭的空間，因為第4區域跟第5區域讓回血的重要性極大幅提升，沒有回血或是可以給你容錯率的聖物，那你那一輪後面不會玩的多開心。

然後那個第5區域，應該是有參考Hades，但是卻是完全的拙劣版，完全沒有任何商店在附近以及回血之類的幫助，整個區域就是拖台錢的聚集地，聽官方說之後會把這部分改善，就當作是我假裝期待一下。

武器的平衡也是欠佳，弓箭跟法仗要到後期聖物，武器客製解鎖完才有戲唱，鐮刀算是唯一有在呼吸的近戰武器，其他的真的直接放棄治療。

這款跟Hades的相似性真的很高，你很難不把兩者拿來比較，撇除劇情，但即使是連遊戲性，整體的平衡，內容，Hades都做的比較好，甚至價錢還只差了80塊，那真的還不如省下這筆錢

Very nice game, couple of bugs here and there especially being unable to invite someone to the lobby if your already in there but other than that its solid, friend suggests adding more weapons but im not to sure about that, after all i had been playing for a couple hours before he joined me so he didnt have to run around with the plain sword for several games before bow, staff and hammer were unlocked, playing with the basics as they are you get a real sense of challenge to get through the beginning levels especially as the difficulty ramps up the more you play (although that might be a problem if you put the game down for a long period of time and you forget how to play due to muscle memory being overwritten). ahhh suggestions then, maybe after you've beaten the first run through add a lever to decrease the difficulty of the game for a couple of runs through the levels. oh and maybe if more skills/relics are added put in like a limiter on which ones can be used say like a minimum of 40 relics and 10 skills and you can add more or change them out at some spot or other (just gonna note here that if these are already in the game im only on the 3rd world just got my ass kicked by the miniboss "herald" so apologies if they are)

143757647.review:
Charming game, I love the art style and music, even the visual effects are nice and the little bonus stars granted when you play multiplayer. It makes for a fun experience for sure with the right people.

[b]What I like about this game: Multiplayer[/b]

I like that drops are basically a free-for-all. When playing, if I think a stat orb or relic is better suited for someone else, I just give them all if so (and vice versa). It encourages one another to help build each other's synergies and builds, which is really fun. 

I love the [spoiler]surprise rooms like the offering room and the chest rooms.[/spoiler] They add some more fun to the game.

The sound effects and the art, again, are beautiful. I like the concept of "perfect skills" having bonus abilities too, it's made me basically a pro at using skills and so much fun to execute. Very rhythm-like at a certain point.

the speedrun rewards are also so fun and rewarding. It feels good! 

[b]My concerns about this game: It is overly frustrating, and not in a fun "rogue-lite" way.[/b]

Some relics feel pointless to unlock. For example there are some that only work for the first attack you do in a room (which, feels so pointless when you're fighting a multitude of enemies. A one-time use for a room for a small bonus? it's a bit laughable.)

There's little to no reward for defeating a mini-boss, which they can be horribly overpowered for little payoff, so often my partner and I will just barely scathe through a room and be disappointed when nothing comes up for our work. Even if it was just little orbs I'd be happy honestly.
Additionally, the two sword rooms (?) are just enemies. No reward afterwards. It's probably to tell you it's just enemies but... It feels so unnecessary? Who would choose that? I find that a bit redundant.

Especially in the very last world [spoiler]when there are no relics, stat selector, etc avaliable! it is endless enemies and a horrible pain when everyone is dead and no one is revived even when you get to the boss.[/spoiler] it is unfortunately my least favorite part of this game, and all of the efforts made during the run feel so pointless just trying to sludge through to progress. which is not a good feeling to have for a roguelite. The big boss is just... the worst in my opinion. 2-3 shots and you're down. Feels like you can't progress in a run without healing or freezing abilities... And you end up just spectating if you're dead. Not as nice if one person is overly OP and everyone is very weak.

The movement in this game could be improved. I utilize a lot of the skills but struggle since you often have to stand still. I feel like the movement is a bit choppy for me in that regard. Or at least the UI makes it really difficult for me to understand what's going on the screen half the time. Sometimes I'm taken off guard by enemies that are hidden beneath health bars/skills which is frustrating. 

I wish there was a little more visual clarity, especially seeing what skills are available next to my character or something, since more times than not I confuse myself when trying to stay focused on where I am on the map vs seeing what abilities I can use. 

The carry-on progression is okay, ember starts being less important as the game goes on. I do wish it had other uses (maybe it does and I haven't gotten to that point?) but if it offered healing that would be nice.

Yeah that's just a few of my concerns. As frustrated as I am with this game, I do really like the secrets and unlocking new colors. The world and it's characters are so cute and fun, so regardless I still enjoy playing when I do. I don't know if I'd play alone though, just with friends. Of course some of these issues might just be my own issues, I'm not a "pro" at playing rogue-lites but I still love to play them. I just wish there was a bit more balance.

143709538.review:
적당량의 플레이타임에 적당히 즐길수 있으며, 한정된 시간 안에서 괜찮은 즐거움을 주는 게임.
로그라이트로써 게임의 구조가 나쁘지 않으며, 그래픽은 훌륭함. 아래는 아쉬운 부분을 적습니다.

게임 진행도커브에 비해 엔딩까지 걸리는 시간이 짧다. 아이템이 언락되는것에 비해 게임 엔딩이 한참 빠르다는 의미이고, 그마저도 엔딩 이후의 컨텐츠가 없어 로그라이트 게임이지만 엔딩만 보면 바로 유기되버리는 구성. 엔딩 이후에 할 수 있는 도전적 컨턴츠가... 있으나 보상도 딱히 없고, 추가 컨텐츠가 전무한 상황. 게임 구성이 빈약하고 무기밸런스 및 스킬의 밸런스, 아이템의 다양성이 매우 부족합니다. 2만원어치 게임에 5~10시간 정도의 플레이 타임을 기대해 볼 수 있고, 그 이후의 컨텐츠에 관심이 없다면 구매해볼만 합니다만, 이게임의 조상들 (슬더슬, 하데스, 엔터더 건전)의 절반이라도 기대한다면 분명히 후회하거나 아쉬움을 느낄 여지가 많습니다. 추가 컨텐츠가 업데이트가 될지는 모르나 현재로써는 아쉬워보이는 게임.

143679122.review:
Approaching 60 hour review:

This game is really REALLY good for a fast-paced roguelike. While there are not a ton of levels, the bosses have crazy variations that range from fairly simple to absolutely insane. 

Half of my playtime was Solo and the other half was co-op with 2-4 players. Personally, I enjoy solo more for "hardcore" runs simply because it's all up to me, but co-op is incredibly fun with friends, especially when you look into doing stuff like giving specific stats to players with specific weapons. Nothing like giving 16 gems of wisdom to  the Nexal Staff user!

I usually don't ever push for a "completed" game, but I'm going to with this one. Good stuff!

143484914.review:
- Mom, can I have Hades?
- No, we have Hades at home.
Hades at home:

---

Basically all variability everyone is hyping in the comments comes down to applying different status ailments. Burn when you freeze. Stun when you burn. Deal damage when you stun. 2% to call lightning when you poison. 25% to call a more powerful lightning when you apply a lightning effect. Wow, these are some quality upgrades and they change the gameplay of hitting enemies so much. *Slow clap*
Shops are insanely random and contain skills you don't need and can't reroll into items. Shop is shit = run is shit.
Due to how skills work and a lot of effect on attack relics, the players are forced to use high attack speed weapons.
Multiplayer is harder than singleplayer because of the absence of free revives, and since the players share shop contents, it's harder to perfect your build = less survivability = die more often = spend revives = game over.

The more you scratch the surface, the more weird design decisions you notice.

143453959.review:
39h ! C'est ce qu'il m'aura fallu pour réussir les 44 succès de ce jeu et le finir a 100%.

UNE CLAQUE ! Vraiment, ce jeu est addictif, fuyez si vous êtes faible d'esprit, vous lancez une game en vous disant vous avez 1h30 avant d'aller vous coucher et vous finissez par aller vous coucher a 5h du mat !

Je ne pose que rarement des notes ou des test, mais ce jeu m'en a donner l'envie, surtout qu'il manque énormément de mise en lumière vu tout ce qu'il apporte.

***LES PLUS***

- Un gameplay dynamique, et qui se renouvelle sans cesse, vous devenez de plus en plus fort, et cela se ressent, que ce soit dans la conception de votre build, de votre gameplay ou des futur features qui se débloques au fur et à mesure, c'est un véritable tour de force, et une des principales qualités du titre
- Le bestiaire, complet, varié, et vous demandera un temps d'adaptation a chaque monde.
- Les mécaniques se renouvellent assez régulièrement et demandent une bonne observation des ennemies.
- Les boss sont cools, et les variantes tout autant.
- La bande son est propre, et travaillé
- Une coop online et offline un peu fouillis au début mais on arrive au bout de quelques heure à bien s'y retrouver.
- Des secrets plutôt bien caché et vous débloquant des features dans votre HUB
- De nombreux skins différents, que ce soit les armes ou les différentes couleurs à débloquer
- La durée de vie


***LES MOINS***

- La durée de vie pas assez longue ! Enfin... 39h c'est plus que correct, mais comme toute bonne série que vous avez adoré, la fin vous laisse un goût amer... Vous en voudrez plus, toujours plus. J’espère que des mises à jour viendront compléter le titre, j'y reviendrais avec plaisir.
- Une histoire un peu beaucoup anecdotique, semblable à ses concurrents Roguelite


***LA CONCLUSION***

Comme vous plus haut, le jeu à énormément de points positifs, et peu de négatifs, la courbe de progressions est bonne et superbement bien maîtrisé, vous offrant une rejouabilité dénuée de frustration. La coop offre un plus non négligeable, progresser et débuter avec ses amis offre un plaisir satisfaisant, où l'on discute de son avancé avec ses mates, on refait la run pour voir comment l'améliorer et c'est cool. En bref, ce jeu m'a conquis moi et mes deux amis avec qui j'aurais partagé une bonne partie de mon épopée. N'hésitez pas à vous y plonger avec vos amis ou en solo, pour son prix (14.99€ en promo) je n'en suis pas du tout déçu.


Je note ce jeu à la note de 9/10, un must have dans sa bibliothèque de jeu. C'est un grand OUI pour ce jeu, et je tire mon chapeau (fictif) aux développeurs qui signe un titre magistral, qui mériterait bien plus de succès qu'il n'en a actuellement.


Merci pour ces beaux moments d'insomnies =)

143448297.review:
玩了一段时间，总的来说是一款非常经典、非常有潜力的rouge游戏。游戏风格非常像Hades，不过Hades我玩的也少，与我而言有点像失落城堡的风格。
优点的话，打击感很棒、操作流畅，这对动作游戏来说都是很重要的体验。怪物技能和数值的设计也非常的优秀，整个流程的怪物从易到难，是一个相当循序渐进的过程，也没有很恶心的粪招。
然后是缺点。作为一个已经1.0正式版的游戏，游戏内容还是显得捉襟见肘，关卡只有仅仅五关，武器也只有六种，虽说有分支选择但仍略显单调，解锁圣物的过程略显拖沓，而且有些流派的核心圣物解锁的过于晚了，可以说游戏后面完全是靠解锁圣物、尝试新圣物支撑。圣物的平衡性也有待考量，有些圣物甚至是任何流派都会带来相当质变的提升（比如杀4个怪+1攻击力那个），而有一些哪怕本身的流派都显得不那么实用（记得毒伤流就有几个），其次，就目前而言，圣物的数量虽然不算太多，但对于想凑起一个流派来说并不是件易事，关卡给的圣物全局只有五次刷新的机会，商店刷新的成本也并不低。建议以后可以让玩家在一开始做个选择，后续刷新的圣物能稍微倾向于选择的流派，这样带来的游戏体验会好很多。（但还是要多多设计新圣物新流派！！！）
至于联机方面………………呜呜呜呜呜呜呜
玩家入手的话，现阶段76元的价格并不是很值得，五六折入会是个不错的选择，亦或是等后续游戏内容更丰富时再考虑入手。
总而言之，你再多做点内容，我这就只有吹爆了=ω=

143446561.review:
可联机的哈迪斯代餐
手感相当不错，在地图里藏了不少秘密和彩蛋这点也十分讨喜。联机的体验很好，加大分了，不过如果能把圣物丢出来，毛队友的圣物会更好（。
肉鸽的部分感觉还有改进的空间，首先各流派的核心基本都要玩到后期才能解锁，早期不给爽。此外各个流派成型后感觉强度不太平衡，每次通关拿的技能和遗物基本趋于同质化，靠刷新技能打范伤打输出，靠暴击吸血打续航。其他的元素有关的流派给我的感觉是前期过渡很舒服，但是元素相关的伤害很少有提升的手段，而且提升的幅度也很小，到后期伤害根本不够看，只能拿来作为上异常的手段并配合武器对异常增伤的遗物，支撑不起其作为一局游戏的核心流派。基本后期的主要伤害来源还是堆过数值的武器伤害或者技能伤害。
总体而言体量不大，期待以后能更新加入更多内容。打折，有朋友一起联机玩的情况下推荐购买，其他情况下慎入。

143400823.review:
*2등신 케릭터로 하는 명작 로그라이트

Hadea를 떠올리게 하는 재미를 가진 로그라이트. 다른점이라면, 4인까지 코옵을 지원해 지루함을 덜었다는 점.
비주얼적으로는 알록달록 하고 귀여운 2등신이라는 특징이 있다. 다만, 너무 알록달록하고 이펙트도 화려해 가시성이 좋지만은 않다.
스킬이나 능력치도 룰렛을 돌려 선택하는 방식에 매순간, 스테이지 선택등 다양한 선택지가 주어져, 선택의 연속이라는 게임의 특성에 매우 충실히 부합하는 게임이다. 

코옵 기능이 있어 같이할 친구들이 있다면 상당히 재미잇게 할 수 있으나, 혼자서는 꽤나 어려운 난이도를 느낄 수 있다. 엄청나게 어려운 것은 아니지만, 방심하면 잡몹들에게도 순삭당하며, 보스들의 패턴도 스테이지가 올라갈수록 빠르고 기발해져 반응속도를 최대치로 끌어올리게 만든다. 보스들 패턴이 약간 탄막슈팅게임을 떠올리게도 하지만, 꽤나 널럴한 회피 판정이 있어 패턴만 익히면 누구나 피할 수 잇다. 물론, 5번째 보스는 말도안되는 패턴 변화속도때문에 그래도 어렵다.

143364905.review: Starts slow, but picks up quickly. Overall, the game is very fun and has a cute stylized design. I was able to grind through 95% of the content in 10-15ish hours, but it's the last 5% I take great issue with as a roguelite achievement hunter. Biggest gripe I have is when farming character colors (for achievements), I'm either extremely unlucky or the spawnrate for the "achievement event" is very low. I'm on my 15th run and can't find 2 of the randomly-spawned areas to get the character colors. After completing the game with a packed 10-15hrs of nonstop new content, the additional 6 hours I just spent grinding for the 2 last achievements has been extremely monotonous as I need to keep grinding until stage 2 and stage 4 for the chance of certain events to occur. Every time I get to the boss of the area without these events occurring, I get more and more irked. Maybe I'll pick it up in the future, but the current formula of items and skills makes the gameplay loop a little unbearable while hunting for achievements.

143342003.review:
I recommend this rogue-like game, but it falls a bit short when it comes to content. However, it compensates by offering a co-op feature, which is a brilliant idea. I played for two hours with a friend, and they grew weary of the game because, in the beginning, the skills seemed somewhat underwhelming (poison, in particular, was quite disappointing in terms of damage). The interactions with the robot and the NPC for skill upgrades were too brief; it would have been better if they were more extended throughout the game's progression. I found myself finishing a run, talking to the relic NPC, and immediately starting another run, which felt a bit disheartening.

On the positive side, the interactions with the food items were great – I really enjoyed that aspect. If the same level of creativity were applied to relic/skill synergies, the game would be excellent! Ultimately, it's an enjoyable game to play, and achieving 100% completion isn't overly difficult. As I write this review, I just completed the 100% myself. One thing that could make it even better would be enhancements to attack speed; I find myself yearning for more opportunities to break the game haha.

143294067.review:
Ember Knights is a tidy little roguelike with tons of charm; up to four players can get together and slug their way through a wide variety of unique enemy types and bosses on their way to the Big Bad, acquiring Relics, Skills and Stat Boosts to power up as they go. There are six different weapon types to unlock, each with its own unique playstyle.

While Ember Knights has only four total stages, the replayability here is quite high, as completing those four stages (including your first brush with the Big Bad) only unlocks the "True Game," giving you access to weapon upgrades and modifications, a special pre-run shop using high-end in-game currency and roughly a dozen difficulty modifiers that you'll need to activate to various levels in order to complete a True Run.

Ember Knights is an easy Recommendation--it works best with friends, but offers a strong singleplayer experience too. Give it a look!

143205641.review:
アーキテクト領域のプラクシスまで倒しました。

一言で言うとマルチプレイ可能なHADESなのですが、
当方一人でここまでプレイしました。

みんなでやると面白い系なのかと思いきや、
骨太なアクションゲームで一人でも大満足。
敵の攻撃の当たり判定がしっかりしており、
これ系のゲームにありがちな「今の食らってねーだろ！」というストレスが無いのが最大のポイント。

正直なところ序盤は退屈でしたが、
武器改造が出来るようになってから一気に面白さが加速していきました。

難易度調整の方向性について
HADESでは難易度を上げていくと地面トラップ系のものが増えて
折角のハイスピードアクションの良いところを潰していました。
それに対しこちらは敵の数を増やしたり、攻撃力を増やしたりの調整寄りだったため自分好みでした。

気になった点
ビルドの幅があまりありません。
毒や火傷などのドットダメージ系はそれだけでは効果が薄く、
状態異常にかかっているとスタンする等の装備と組み合わせていくのですが、
棲み分けがあまりできていないため、組んでいくと属性は違うのになんとなく同じようなビルドになっていきます。

このこともあり、このゲームをおすすめできるのは
ビルドを構築して俺TUEEしたい人よりも、アクションでしっかり避けて反撃することに喜びを覚える方になります。

143153199.review:
最高難易度をとりあえず全クリ。全体的に出来の良いローグライクゲームといった感じでオススメです。ただ職業バランスについは少しどうかなといった感じ。弓が圧倒的に強くて、特に5方向に攻撃できる強化がHIT数重視のゲームシステムと相まって更に最強クラス。逆にハンマーとか鎌は何一ついいところがなく苦行レベル。
他の内容については他の方が大体レビューしているので、自分は以下ぶっ壊れと感じたレリックについて述べます。

・若返りのグローブ
クリティカル時に体力が回復する効果を持つエピックレアリティのレリック。本ゲームには手に入れやすいノーマルレアリティのレリックの中に「体力回復時にクリティカル率大幅UP」と「体力回復量UP」のものが存在するため、それらと併せてステータスをクリティカル率極振りにしたら最終的にクリ率100%になるので攻撃してるだけで一生体力が減らなくなります。回復手段が乏しく体力管理が極めて重要な本ゲームにおいて、一切体力を気にしなくてならなくなってしまう最大のバランスブレイカー。

・氷河のネックレス
スキル使用時に雪玉を投げて凍結させるエピックのレリック。本ゲームの状態異常の中でも凍結は最強クラスの状態異常で、スタンと違いクールダウンの概念が存在しないのでスキル連打できる構成ならかなりの頻度で敵の行動を封じられる。ボス戦では無効なのであまり意味ないものの、これ1つで道中はかなり安定する。

・タイタンのウォーギア
敵を4体武器で倒すごとに永続的に武器攻撃力が上がるレジェンダリーのレリック。レジェンダリーなので入手は難しいが、手に入れた後の火力の伸びは圧倒的。全体的にステータスを伸ばす類のアイテムが条件きつかったり伸びが渋かったりするものが多い中、明らかに設定間違えてるんじゃないかってレベル。

とりあえず上記の3つは突出して強いと感じました。というか全体的にレジェンダリのレリックが出にくさに対して効果が微妙なものが多く、下手したらノーマルにも負けてるようなものが多いのは調整不足かなと思う。

143148003.review:
本人手残手柄党，买了这个游戏后将近三十个小时才通关，除了有一些皮肤没有解锁之外绝大部分的圣物和技能都收集完了。看到评论区经常会有一些牛子节猫猫头的评论，感觉很难对想入手这款游戏的朋友有一个参考。那我就简单的描述一下这款游戏我玩的一些感受和想法。

首先是这个游戏的可玩性。说句实话，毕竟是新游戏关卡少可以理解，但是算上最后的boss城只有五个地区还是太少了些。武器也是继承哈迪斯那边的武器系统，没有太多的新鲜感可言。圣物对人物的加成也不是很大，有很多圣物必须有好几个圣物的combo才有明显的效果。这一方面我是很不满意的。由于我是个重度《雨中冒险2》玩家，所以我很喜欢各种道具可以非常直观的体现在战斗和人物细节上。包括哈迪斯里面捡众神的祝福你的各种技能效果都有改变。但是这个游戏里面没有任何改变。有一些圣物的触发条件过于苛刻，或者很鸡肋。比如有一个圣物是把你所有的闪电效果改为闪电球。但是闪电效果只有拿到了另外一个特定的攻击触发雷电的圣物才能有，等等等等。建议开发组对这一点进行优化。单一的圣物的存在价值非常之低，这在一个rougelike的游戏里是不能吸引人的我觉得。如果每一个圣物都需要一套固定的搭配那么rouge的意义在哪。

其次就是怪物的攻击欲望实在是太强。虽然这个游戏里的闪避功能很强大，让你可以在合适的时候躲掉任何攻击，但是对于新手来说怪物的攻击欲望还是太强了。而且非常缺乏回血。我试过一次循环，循环第二轮的boss一下可以直接打我75点血量。这75点血量我如果不是吸血流派可能需要一整个世界的回血手段才能回上来。我觉得这并不是增加游戏乐趣，这是给玩家添堵。

骂都骂完了说点好的。作为这么一个像素风的游戏，它的打击感还是很好的，打击音效也很不错。最最最最主要的是它可以联机。和朋友一起玩的感觉很棒。大家的招式都很酷，一起欢声笑语打怪物的感觉还是很不错的。我也并没有玩完这个游戏的所有内容，我也只是以我的视角评价一下我玩这款游戏的感受。总体来说还是一个比较不错的游戏。说了那么多缺点也只是希望它可以越做越好，毕竟是个新游戏，开发组肯定会更新的。不像某《传说法师》，二快出了一就被彻底遗忘了。。。

写了这么多给个好评不过分吧。。。

143130848.review:
I really like this game, I'm a fan of rouge likes but, as everything in the world, it's not perfect.
Below is my opinion about the mechanics and gameplay feeling.

- Catchy and addicting - Once you finish most of the unlocks the games become easier and you can go into crazy builds that make the runs easy
- Variety of builds - you can chose from multiple builds (fire, poison, ice, lightning) to finish the game multiple times
- Smooth graphics and cool concept - at some point you can get so strong you can loop win indefinitely (if the game doesn't crash)
- Still has more to offer as I haven't mastered it or finished it 100%, so I can get more from it.

A list with what I would improve in a random order:

1 Most animations can't be skipped after seeing them at least once. been here 100 times.
-> please let me skip them, including the one finishing the biome under the reward time limit. Make the reward to stay there and if you get over the time, it's gone or locked or flies away.

2 Rewards for killing bosses don't feel rewarding enough, 
-> you could make like a spin the wheel that either gives money, embers, skills or relics. you can insert gold or embers to increase the chance to get something better (just a thought)

3 You can't recycle food or items you don't need
-> I have builds where I don't need food or new items, however I have to waste them just because

4 items that can be broken to give gold in some locations seem to be purposely placed so you might miss them, others give way too little gold, other entire levels seem to be void of gold (3rd and 4th biome mostly)
-> I know there are items that can help with costs (money after killing mobs or the coupon) but it's not an option to always hunt for them.

5 Tooltips dont show how much damage abilities do
-> I can see a poison effect applies 1 stack, for how long and how much damage? Percentage damage increase 

6 Way too few levels and the randomness (if any) is minimal. Not to mention the last level has actually no rewards, shops. 
-> Being a small team is not an excuse. you wouldn't buy a car without steering wheel or seats because they are a small company, on the promise they will deliver them on a later date.
Don't get me wrong, I understand the effort, I appreciate any content however do it right.

7 The inability to save the current progress in a run and come back later and resume play.
-> If I start playing I have to commit to it, there is no going back. Would be nice to be able to save in a middle of an endless run, go to sleep, come back the next day and continue.

8 Mobs debuffs on player. They can keep you rooted and get chain rooted and get hit and can't escape and die.
-> it's not fun to get chained hit by abilities and can't do anything. Make me spam a button or break the constrains with specific combination or keys.

9 Sometimes the current room ends in a door and I don't even know what's behind it.
-> make all doors to have icon available showing description and even bosses should have two doors. Normal boss with normal rewards and harder boss with bigger rewards.

Overall I enjoy this game, it's addictive, fun and at some point challenging. Bit too short, bit too unrefined.
It's a gem still being cut, but please make the correct ones and don't botch it.

143105011.review:
A good roguelite with a few flaws. It's worth the price in my opinion. Definitely better with friends.
It's not a must have for roguelite enjoyers but there is a lot of fun to be had here.

Positives:
Visuals
Interesting skills and synergies, not super complex.
Combat is fun.
6 Unique weapons with different playstyles.

Negatives:
The game starts out at its weakest. Until you get to world 4 and defeat the miniboss twice you can't upgrade your weapons which personalizes your build.

All weapons are viable but Sword is definitely on a higher lever than the other weapons. It's hard to keep up with the damage of my hammer which ironically has one of the lowest damage outputs in the late game. (Most relic upgrades grants effects that scale better with high attack speed).

The story is very much a secondary part and it feels like it could have been more.

装備のシナジーを考えるのもまずはここを越えられないと厳しいと思います。
逆に、最初のボスを倒せるところまでいけば、いろいろと頭を使うところもでてきて面白くなってくるでしょう。

道中はスキルのパーフェクト溜めうちや武器のクリティカルからスタンや凍結に持っていけるビルドが組めれば
３つ目のワールドまではなんとかなる感じですが、ほかの方が書いている通り４つ目以降は敵が超固いのと、
攻撃頻度短い範囲攻撃をバンバン出してくるのでメイン武器の手数が稼げなくて詰みやすい印象です。

現状でばっちり面白いからオススメですが
できればソロの難易度上昇曲線はちょっとゆるやかにしてほしいですかね。

143034000.review:
Hades на минималках

Геймплей: в среднем по больнице норм, боевка приятная, все еще немного не понимаю как при такой динамике мили драк использовать постоянно идеальные версии абилок не сбавляя темп, нет нет да обосрешься и получишь дмг. 
Возможности: Вроде и выглядит все так что билдов приятное количество, но за 16ч я пока склоняюсь к тому, что не нашел вампирик - тебе будет ультра хуево в 5ом мире. Остюда моя субъективная оценка о бесполезности большей части билдов, если не запихать туда отхил.
Музыка: через 3 часа была выкручена в 0 и включена своя, очень уныленько, серо и незаметно. Хотел бы чуть более интересное музыкальное сопровождение.
Сюжет: не Hades, но никто и не ждал, поэтому вообще покс.
Кооп: есть и он очень приятный, бегать с другом несколько веселее чем соло, хотя и так и так игру можно пройти, думаю здесь заслуга в грамотной системе повышения сложности от количество игроков.

В целом, как и пишут в отзывах, 5й мир полная дрисня, бежать его желание крайне ниже среднего, поскольку в большинстве случаев ты там можешь полутать только пиздюлей и слить рес, ни о каком усилении чара в последнем мире речи не идет. Так что если уж собрал билд вилку и тебе не хватает пары предметов (да даже одного госпади) чтобы он нормально игрался, то пятый мир можно запушить только ради спортивного интереса.

Не стану отрицать, что даже играя фулл дерьмом можно пройти босса, но темп игры получится ооочень низким, мне такое не нра.

Дам 3 из 5, подождем патчей и посмотрим за прогрессией и балансировкой. 
Своих денег в целом стоит в качестве развлечения на компанию.

143020339.review:
Esse jogo comete um pecado que na minha opinião não deveria haver em roguelikes/roguelites: ele é curto e tem pouco conteúdo. Esse jogo também tem muito desbalanceamento, principalmente numa variante específica do boss do mundo 2, sério, aquilo é nojento, ridículo.

Apesar dessas coisas negativas que mencionei, estou recomendando o jogo pelo fato de que ele é realmente muito divertido, principalmente com amigos, se você for jogar só com +1 já está ótimo. Eu odeio o fato de que são apenas 17 magias, e que dessas, só umas 7 realmente prestam. A magia mais roubada desse jogo é o dado: ele dá dano quando passa pelos inimigos e, dependendo do número que sai ao ser rolado (já que é um dado), ele tem um efeito diferente. É a única skill capaz de dar um baita dano violento ao tirar 6 (conjura meteoros), e também é a única skill que é capaz de curar (ao tirar 4), o que o torna simplesmente indispensável em qualquer build já que ele é incrível e muito além das outras skills do jogo, então falta muito balanceamento e magias novas que, na minha opinião, deveriam ser adicionadas.

Nem tudo são espinhos... Como eu disse, apesar das coisas ruins, poucas magias e tal, dá pra fazer umas builds legais com as relíquias que você vai pegando pelo mapa, são 86 no total.

Conclusão: Esse jogo tem coisas que eu desaprovo muito pro gênero dele, mas apesar de tudo, como eu já disse, é muito divertido jogando com amigos e, por conta dele ser bem desbalanceado, acaba sendo muito desafiador, o que é algo que eu gosto hahaha

Recomendo esperar uma promoção e garantir no mínimo uma pessoa para jogar com você, porque o conteúdo desse jogo é realmente muito pouco pro gênero e há o risco de se enjoar rápido dele.

Great game, the mechanics are really well implemented, I find it one of the most fair action roguelikes out there. It's not perfect, there are some flaws. Some enemies and their attacks are so quick at times that even a perfectly timed dodge won't help, and the visuals can become really overwhelming in the later stages. I did have my fair share of rage-inducing moments, but it rarely felt like the game put me in a situation in which I couldn't have done anything, and even then I felt like it might have just been bad luck with items.
The multiplayer is also really well implemented, and by always seeing the other players pick their items, the game nudges you to think and talk about what you want to do, and how to approach the run (I'm not even sure if this was intentional). It's much more collaborative, which makes it more fun in my opinion.

BUT PLEASE ADD AN OPTION FOR A SMALLER HUD thx :)

142975039.review:
A Brutal Honest Review 

If I had to give this game a score its 7/10 it has good and bad in it but I think the game is alright, I played it solo and it was an okay experience, I just wish that melee was more rewarding like the range but who knows they could bring some new changes that can change the game up. I do not like the fifth area; it's a festering hell hole and it makes me shake with rage when I am not running a crit leech build. To get to the last boss you have to put all these modifiers on that will make the game a lot tougher which is a welcome change. I 100% the game and got all of the achievements so My biggest complaint is that it's really short. 5 levels plus the last final boss is not enough. Endless mode is alright because you can continue the game with the same build but that's it, nothing else except doing those 5 levels over and over. 

The last boss itself is not enough why is he throwing mini-bosses at me that can be easily killed off and offer no challenge, If it was the Bosses I think it would be amazing and the last boss is easy if he  had gained all the previous bosses abilities it would make me really have to remember and work for the ending. it will take the average gamer at least 10 to 15 hours to really beat the game and that's it. If this could get some bonus levels with more risk reward and I also feel like the perk tree is really limiting me if I get all those upgrades why can't I just have them all you literally put 20,000 points into it and get like a few. It also needs some better perks for the weapons I have unlocked most of the upgrades and they feel good when you have a synergy going on but other than that some outshine the others and it really feels underwhelming. 

I would love to see more in-game events with fun mini games or Fights that offer like a perk for the entire run. I would really wait for more content in the game that improves upon it and makes me want to replay it. If you want to buy this game do not let me stop you but I really think you should wait for a sale so you can play with a friend or wait for more content.

Il titolo si presenta come un roguelite giocabile sia in singleplayer che in coop (bilanciato molto bene in entrambi i casi), con una decente varietà di armi, una grande possibilità di fare build diverse, una grande fluidità nel gameplay, nemici molto simpatici e a volte fin troppo cattivi e tanto divertimento.

142964623.review:
Got the game in early access. It's a superb action roguelike if you're looking for something with a medium difficulty with friends. The gameplay was fast enough that clearing rooms never felt like it overstayed its welcome, while being decently forgiving enough that you could make a few mistakes without the entire run ending. I'd say it's a smidge below Hades in terms of difficulty, which I personally like.

Replayability was good for the first ~10 hours, thereafter I was still unlocking relics but had discovered all the skills. Skill additions would be nice in the future, if possible. That being said, finding synergies between relics and skills were still a joy even in my recent runs.

Multiplayer connectivity was never a pain point, so that's a plus too.

Whenever I'm looking to have a hack & slash session with friends, this will be my go-to for sure.

친구랑 하기 좋은 최대 4인용 멀티게임
현재 무기는 총 6개로(현재 시점) 각각 무기들의 공격방식이 있으며
물리공격 위주 와 마법공격위주의 플레이로 나뉜다.

물리공격 경우 마법은 대체로 유물효과를 발동하기위한것이 아니라면 CC기용도로 사용되며
마법에 비해 물리데미지 자체를 높히는 방법이 다양해서 딜도 잘 나오며, 현자타임도 비교적 적을뿐더러
데미지 를 올리기 쉽다.

반면 마법공격의 경우엔 물리공격에 비해 약하다 싶진않으나, 이 게임의 마법에 경우
'쿨타임' 이 '초 당' 이 아니라 '타격 당' 이기에 10갱신 의 경우 10대를 적을 때려야 쿨타임이 돌는 형식이다.
그렇기에 마법사 의 경우에도 적극적으로 평타를 치는등 마법쿨타임을 돌려야하며
반면 마법공격력을 높혀야하기에 비교적 물리공격력 자체를 올리는일이 없어
마법을 사용하고난후 현자타임이 어느정도 있으나 그래도 마법무기만의 빠른 스킬 쿨타임 돌리기 로
스킬을 난사할수있어 물리공격무기의 단점인 광역기 의 부재 가 해결되며
순간적인 폭딜을 뽑아내기 좋은 유물들이 한가득하여 초반에 좀 화력이 부족하다 싶더라도
후반에는 왕귀형 인 느낌으로 굉장히 강해질수 있다.

로그라이트 게임 인 만큼 죽더라도 더 강해져서 시작하는등 해금요소들도 다양하게 있으며
숨겨진 요소(도전과제, 컬러 등등) 또한 있어. 친구들과 찾아보는 재미도 있다.

개인적으로 혼자해도 재밌으나 친구와 함께하는편이 더욱 즐거울것이라 생각하며
친구없는 사람도 재밌게 할수있음으로 추천한다.

142916576.review:
Ember Knights! Brace yourselves for a Roguelike like no other. From the moment you dive in, the game grabs you with its elegant simplicity and accessible mechanics, making you eager to hit the 'play' button again and again. The anticipation of discovering novel relics and skills adds an enchanting spark from the outset.

But oh, it's not just about collecting items and honing abilities! As you delve deeper into this mesmerizing realm, you'll uncover hidden secrets, unlock vibrant character colors, and encounter ever-changing boss and miniboss battles. Each discovery feels like unearthing a buried treasure, adding to the richness of the Ember Knights journey.

Conquered the game once? Brace yourself for the real thrill! Challenge mode unlocks post-victory, beckoning you to take the skills you've honed to new heights and uncover the deeply satisfying 'true' ending.

But the party doesn't stop there! The triumphant feeling of defeating the final boss paves the way for Endless Mode. Here, you continue your adventure, equipped with all your earned skills and relics, facing increasingly formidable foes. It's a testament to the brilliance of the game, a true test of a knight's prowess!

Ember Knights has reignited the Roguelike genre, and stands tall among the best I've experienced in recent times. The anticipation for future updates, eagerly awaited DLC, and innovative challenges is palpable. 

Ember Knights, 10 outta 10 Would Play Again

142903473.review:
This is honestly one of my favorite games as of recently. I play games with a few friends online and the same league games got really stale and we were looking for something new. We really liked castle crashers and have always wanted something with the similar multiplayer functionality and this game overfilled that hole completely. The combat style is very much like Hades but the game feels very castle crashers like with the chaotic enemies, spells, and attacks flying around the screen at all times.

My friends and I became hooked instantly, me especially. I bought this game 2 days ago at the time of writing this and I have already logged around 16 ish hours. The game gives you 3 save files so you can have one for one group of friends, another for a personal world, and an extra on top of that. For the sale price of $11 or $12 that we bought it at, this game is worth way more. I would seriously pay $30 or more for this excellent adventure that is packed into this game.

My only real critique of this game as the beginning feels very slow. Like slower than normal for a rouge like. You don't have many relic, weapon, or spell options and I wish the progress was a little faster. But after unlocking 2-4 weapons, the progression begins to even out into a normal level. And as soon as you pass that hurdle, the game just gets even better. The replay value is through the roof as there is almost always new enemy variants to unlock or just new things to discover as you keep playing. 

This game is good enough as a solo game, but it just gets even better with friends. The game supports up to 4 players, but I have only played with three. There is enough loot to go around but the loot is free for anyone to take so some theft tends to happen from time to time. But this also allows the necessary loot to go to the right people. For example, the gems that give you more max health, is fun to give them to the tanky player to allow them to keep tanking damage as a front line. Or just give one player all the crit chance in the world.

I really hope that everyone can give this game a chance someday. It is very worth the price point for the excellent replay-ability. If the devs decide to make dlc for this game, I would happily buy it.

142901238.review:
轻度休闲类肉鸽，提几个目前存在的问题：
1、单局一个周目的圣物选取次数偏少，想拿齐某个特定的核心combo非常吃运气。常规构筑的核心组件通常是出门前刷基地商店来完成。（基地商店刷特定组合可能消耗大量局外资源）
2、很多跨系联动圣物、回血续航圣物都是后期解锁，前期圣物之间比较缺乏联动。
以上两点，让这个游戏在局外基本全解锁的情况下才开始有爽度。前期开荒会相对枯燥。

3、平衡性有待打磨。
比如两个成长圣物（杀敌加攻击伤害、杀敌加技能伤害）效果过于突出，有就割草，没有刮痧，也说明了局内捡宝石的属性成长，根本不够看。
再比如锤子这种攻速慢的武器，明显弱势。首先技能靠攻击次数刷CD，锤子先吃个哑巴亏。其次，攻击特效（雷、火、毒）也都是和攻击频率挂钩的，锤子再次无缘。最后所有敌人都是霸体，除了依靠冰冻、眩晕等控制效果，武器本身是没有任何打断能力的。锤子出手慢，既没有绝对的面板优势，也没有打眩晕槽的优势，近身拼刀方面再次吃亏。

142884175.review:
Ember Knight，被官方译为《余烬骑士》。
这是一款来自2021年就推出EA测试的游戏，如今正式的推出了！
它有着我最喜欢的冒险元素，同时它还是一款多人联机的肉鸽游戏。
这像素AVG的风格令人怀旧，而这流畅丝滑的动作在高帧率下又体现着它现代的制作工艺。

[h1][quote=]
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]　欢迎关注 [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38287879]网易UU鉴赏家培养计划[/url][/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]　极速畅玩，联机日友，加速社区，记得来UU哦_(:з」∠)_　[/th]
    [/tr]
[/table]
[/quote][/h1]

本作是一款有着非常经典的肉鸽设计的游戏。
即在游戏玩法方面，是以关卡——房间进行的；角色的提升有着等级、武器、圣物和技能来提升的。

游玩方面，它其实就只有一个“副本”，但有非常多的属性可作为“难度”的调整，并非仅限于“简单”、“中等”、“困难”的选项。更加灵活，也带来了更多的趣味。
可使用的武器比较少，仅仅只有六把，不过每把都有几项技能，玩家将它解锁以后可以配合其他内容打造出一条专属的流派。
肉鸽讲究一个随机的养成体系，也正是这个随机会让玩家有着不同的游戏体验，毕不毕业，都是这个系统随机决定的。
而这个“随机”就来源于来源于它的技能与装备（圣物）了。
除了自带的武器技能外，玩家还能够在游戏游玩过程中随机获得可释放的其他技能。
以及，能在游戏中随机获得“圣物”，这个圣物它既可以是提升自己的属性值的装备，也可以是提升自己的buff，有着专属的特效。
而这两个加上开局自选的武器游玩流派，搭配出一套用于通关的专属玩法。当然，这是随机的，能够顺利成装自然是好，能够天胡开局更是爽爆。

圣物是需要玩家在游戏中，多玩几个周目，遇见了才会解锁“游戏百科”的，讲究一个收集玩法。
同样的，还有它的核心——余烬。这个用于余烬之树中解锁“道具”的数值，玩家每一次的下本除了经验，也是为了余烬。有了余烬就能解锁更多的“道具”，这就像一个角色特性词缀一样的，可挑出三个附在角色身上，让角色在下本的时候有更多的“机遇”，或是获取更多的经验，又或是能够获得更多的圣物。

然而，作为一款PC游戏，它的内容是较为少的，体量较少的一款游戏。无论是武器也好，圣物也好，副本甚至只有一个。总之一句话，那就是不过瘾。
所幸，它的重心，就放在了其游戏性上——即操作与多人联机的体验。
其丝滑的动作系统，以及多人联机来进行更高难度的挑战。

无独有偶，这令我想到一款国产佳作的FPS肉鸽也是如此。

肉鸽游戏是一种重复性很强的游戏，甚至比一些刷宝游戏还要肝。而它能做出粘性，留住玩家，就说明它的内容是非常出色的，即便看着经典、平常，甚至体量很小。
我想，应该就是它那爽快又流畅的动作系统，让玩家每一次下本都有机制的游戏体验吧！

142879268.review:
Pedazo de roguelike recién salido del horno, cooperativo online recontra bueno con muy pocos fallos en cuanto a servidores, lag u otros. Perfecto para jugar con amigos (hasta 4) y reventar todo a piñas.
   En cuanto al gameplay se siente super responsivo y fluido el cual es ideal para el frenetísmo que genera cada habitación por la que entras, inspirado completamente en "Hades" especialmente en el sistema de armas iniciales el cual consta de 6 armas diferentes, cada una con variantes de habilidades dando aún más posibilidades a cómo querés jugar al juego. Ayudando aún más con items pasivos(cada uno "sinergizándose" con otro) y habilidades activas, que en vez de tener un tiempo de enfriamiento como de costumbre, se regenera pegando a enemigos con tu arma.
   Gráficos pixel art muy caricaturescos, con una paleta de colores muy llamativa la cual ayuda a entender de forma intuitiva que sucede en cada momento.

En pocas palabras: "Hades" multijugador con bullet hell tipo "Enter the gungeon"

142874481.review:
[h1]可联机的小哈迪斯代餐[/h1]

《余烬骑士》是一款最高支持4人合作的快节奏动作肉鸽游戏，说到底它也只是个小哈迪斯，目前体量与深度均不如哈迪斯，然而，游戏本身仍然提供了数小时的令人满意的游戏体验。值得一提的是，游戏中重点强调的联机模式让你可以与好友一同战斗，但由于没有在线匹配，没好友一起联机玩，而且价格略劝退。
[h1][quote=]
[table]
    [tr]
        [th]　欢迎关注 [url= https://store.steampowered.com/curator/38287879]网易UU鉴赏家培养计划[/url][/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [th]　极速畅玩，联机日友，加速社区，记得来UU哦_(:з」∠)_　[/th]    
   [/tr]

[/table]
[/quote][/h1]

[h1]一本正经的世界观[/h1]

故事发生在混乱的宇宙中。邪恶巫师普拉克西斯窃取了圣洁的余烬树之力，导致整个宇宙陷入混乱。玩家作为余烬骑士被召唤出现，手持利刃与普拉克西斯的爪牙展开战斗，穿梭于各个区域的房间。尽管故事有些老套，但其中蕴含了怨恨与自私所导致的背叛。

[h1]爽快的战斗体验[/h1]

这种动作肉鸽玩的就是一个爽，游戏操作手感极为丝滑，搭配翻滚无敌帧，穿行闪避，方得完美，让你体会到出色的打击感，游戏中共有6种武器，涵盖近战和远程攻击，同时还有大量的技能和遗物等待解锁。技能栏只有2个，因此需要合理搭配连招，才能更加稳妥地应对战斗。随着游戏进程的推进，怪物种类和数量都会发生变化，游戏的难度也会逐渐提高。不过别担心，后续的房间中会提供更多回血机会，房间中偶尔还会有回血道具的掉落，而且每个Boss前基本上必定刷出回血机会，只要你熟练地闪避，战斗问题不大。另外，刷出护甲的遗物也是个不错的选择。

[h1]随机性与自定义[/h1]

游戏的Rogue-lite机制使得每次重新开始都会有随机性，房间的排列组合会有所不同，为你带来一些新鲜感。游戏中共有五个世界，每个世界都有独特的设计，从丛林、火山到冰原和机械厂，场景变化多样，怪物设计也别具一格。此外，游戏的音乐和音效也相当出色，为整体游戏体验增色不少。咱们的主角也可以自定义，火焰颜色稍稍变下。

[h1]火焰不灭，余烬再生[/h1]

死了当然没问题，你会在泉水中复活，然后你通过战斗中获得的宝珠通过鉴定会解锁新的武器，遗物，同时可以在余烬之树升级天赋，如提高生命值，金币数，再续一命等等，虽然有些效果不算太明显，但都是为了让你的旅程更加平坦。

[h1]结语[/h1]

单人体验实在是有限，倒不至于给差评。依旧像素画风可爱，战斗爽快有趣，但真不如去玩《哈迪斯》，当然和朋友一块联机的乐趣已经超过了游戏本身。

142849112.review:
After reaching 100% on this game (at the time of the review) I can say that it's a really solid top-down rougelite. This review WILL be long, so my TL:DR for the people who are just browsing the reviews for this game is:

Great graphics, gameplay and customisation
Rough enemy scaling, difficulty and a bit of imbalance
Forgettable story and music.
Odd performance issues here and there.

Starting with the positives, the game looks great and I thoroughly enjoyed all of the games locales and sprites. The gameplay and customisation go hand in hand and are both really smooth, every weapon feels good to use and serves a purpose, the upgrades they and your Ember Knight can acquire through gameplay feel like upgrades and improvements and by far my favourite thing about the game is the constant flow of progression and synergies. It was only in about the last two hours of game time that I finished collecting all of the game's relics (in level powers) and I still felt I was consistently earning resources for upgrades and other buffs.

A gripe I have with most other rougelites is that the grind feels incredibly daunting, with the hundreds, sometimes thousands of items, equipment and buffs, that all have unique unlock methods while only granting minor improvements. It's overwhelming and results in moments when after I've dropped the game for something else after a good many hours spent playing it, I feel I barely got into it at all. Ember Knight doesn't suffer this problem, every Relic is at the very least beneficial and the amount that clock into that region I can count on one hand. The game both encourages you and provides you with the ability from the start of the run to specialise your setup with a few different base builds such as: ice, fire, poison, electricity, AOE, stun, healing, etc. which all have an expansive level of depth, that can also be built on one another without drawbacks to create some incredibly busted (feeling, I will get to the issues later) builds that happens all organically. The game makes building your character feel more gratifying with every single Relic, stat upgrade and skill you collect to fine tune your play style to however you want. The one complaint I have with strictly the gameplay is that the general method of dealing with enemies is the same, you aim to stun them making them unable to do anything, wail on them and then try to repeat until they're dead. The only other issue I have is that bosses can be annoying and mini bosses too easy.

Now to get to the negatives (and to be a bit of a hypocrite), the game's difficulty really needs some polish. Not counting the difficulty options you unlock after your first completed run, the game's difficulty ramp turns into a spike. The first 3 worlds are generally fine, some encounters end up far tougher than the general flow of the level but it's only occasional, but the fourth and fifth worlds have major problems with enemy health, damage, speed and numbers and types. The increase in challenge isn't my issue, my issue is the fact it comes out of nowhere. It feels like there's supposed to be another world between the third and fourth compared to the gradual climb of the previous levels, but the game just throws you into the deep end with some incredibly obnoxious enemies that highlight two major issues I have with the game.

There are 5 types of character stats you level up as you play: Health, Damage, Skill Damage, Critical Chance and Agility. My main issue is with the health and damage stats and it's due to the enemy scaling. As you progress through a single world I do think that there is an noticeable increase in your abilities while levelling these stats up, but when you reach a new world it feels like you get factory reset. At this point I don't feel stronger, I feel like I've just been dragged back to where I was at the start of the last world. I understand that enemies are supposed to hit harder and take more hits, but it becomes obnoxious if I've spent the world levelling up my health and as soon as I reach the next one I still take the same amount of hits to die as I did for the majority of the previous level. It's issues like this that cause my second major issue with the game and that's the "forced" play style.

If you are playing on (what is basically) the NG+ mode with the customisable difficulty options you are pretty much forced down one of two paths and one of those is far superior. Ice is by far the strongest setup in the game at this moment for three key reasons: 1. It's main gimmick is freezing, which makes sense for ice, but the best way to handle enemies in this game is to stun/immobilise them, which Ice does both of incredibly easily. 2. Ice has the second most spells dedicated to it with 2.5, which doesn't sound like much, but when you max out at 2 equipable spells that means it can quite easily be all you need to run, not to mention both spells are incredibly strong. And 3. Ice has a benefit no other element synergy has, with the right Relic it grants life steal on defeated frozen enemies. If the other elemental abilities had this, this wouldn't be an issue, but because of this one relic, the other options aren't even as close to as good. I have run multiple runs with as many fine tuned builds as possible for each element alone, not mentioning sub genres, which wasn't even close to the average build I could get for ice. The other options are fun and satisfying, but no way near as reliable as ice. The only option that came even close wasn't even an elemental build, it was an armour build, which literally focuses around you gaining temporary health to increase your survivability which is still an issue. The other systems are just objectively inferior and they feel it, which when the game has such an incredible fun and in depth sandbox as this game is really annoying.

Now for the odd bits that fall into neither category, story and music didn't really stand out to me. I didn't expect the story to be 5 stars and it's completely serviceable but nothing special. I genuinely cannot remember a single song of the top of my head from this game, it's fine and fits but I don't remember anything from it. Performance was a fairly frequent issue for me, both in single player and multiplayer, the game never crashed, but freezing was a constant, incredibly frustrating issue and I have no idea what caused it most of the time aside from a couple times where it seemed to be due to a group of enemies that were about to spawn. If any devs decide to read this PLEASE fix this.

In conclusion, despite my critique of the game, it was a good time. It has balance issues, some due to enemy scaling, other due to OP builds, and dependent on how die hard you are for the rougelite it might not offer as much content as you are used to, but I wouldn't have gone for 100% if I didn't enjoy the game. I really hope it continues to do well and if there's any new content planned in the future for this game I look forward to it.

142793135.review:
This is the most boring/mid roguelite I have ever played.
Every run feels the exact same since the Skill/item and enemie variety is so low, you can see every bit of content after about 2 hours of playtime
Meta progressions is boring and just a grind with no real “fun” or interesting options to choose from, even the weapon mods are all just uninspiring or boring.
I would say that most of the already low amount of starting weapons feels lackluster and unsatisfied to use.
The story is a cookie cutter basic bad guy story(to be fair it's a roguelite after all, but an interesting story would still be appreciated)

The only good thing I could say about this game is the great sprite work and good and fitting music.

tldr: A roguelite with basically no content/boring meta progression and very little run variety/replayability.

142789944.review:

"We need more bosses" I said just before unlocking boss variants

"If only there were mutators this would be a cool game" Me moments before unlocking mutators.

Excellent game, my only gripe is that half of the items/stats don't actually tell you their amounts, while half do. Rather odd. Oh well.
The combat is tight, the weapons feel like different classes. I do wish there were more skills, loads of relics but not very many skills.

142789237.review:
Ember Knights is a biome/room based Roguelite. You proceed through small rooms of enemies, and after each room get options of what upgrade the next room will have. (Meta currency, gold, skills, upgrades, etc.) Then you eventually fight a boss, go to the next biome.

We've seen this kind of game before. Ember Knights is a very good iteration of this formula. Combat is fast and fluid, the two skill slots are fun to use, and the upgrades are varied even where each run is similar, but still different.

The meta progression is pretty standard. Game has 6 weapons. Not sure how much gameplay I'll get out of it, but it's been worth it so far.

Also I'm playing Solo, so don't think the game is only fun on co-op.

142784921.review:
游戏操作是键鼠结合的模式，玩起来很丝滑。游戏中的人物翻滚很流畅，主要攻击手段是平砍和猛冲攻击。其中，左键平砍是经典的三段式，而猛冲攻击则是闪避和平砍的结合。而且，猛冲和三段式平砍还能结合使用，十分灵动。

游戏是清版关卡制，每一个关卡都必须把怪物清完才能前往下一个关卡。游戏中的怪物种类很丰富，什么螺旋怪、冒头怪、投掷怪，很多种类型都有，战斗过程并不过程。在不断清理完成关卡后，可以结算对应的奖励。

除了基础的金币奖励之外，特殊的房间还附带特殊的奖励。游戏有着经典的肉鸽设计，每一次游戏中遇到的房间类型都是随机的。不同的房间有着不同的通关奖励，想要黄金、余烬、技能、圣物等，玩家在进入房间前就能一目了然。当然，游戏中还提供了不少岔路，让玩家对自己的行径路线和目标奖励，有一定的选择权。

游戏中的属性主要有，生命值，伤害、技能伤害、暴击、速度。属性很少，但每一种都作用明显。在通关中，会拾取不同的宝石对人物进行增强，例如智慧宝石增加技能伤害，敏捷宝石增加速度，体力宝石增加生命值等。主角的生命值很低，初始只有50点，这意味着整个游戏的战斗核心是要尽量避免受到伤害，然后快速干掉敌人。

在通关过程中，可以拾取各种随机技能，例如对范围敌人造成伤害，并附加燃烧效果；扔出炸弹，把敌人都炸飞，等。与众不同的人，本作的技能使用并不需要蓝条、能量条等东西，而是需要充能点。每击中一次敌人，就能得到一点充能点。这种设定保证了玩家不会滥用技能，又随时有技能可用，充分保证了战斗体验的平滑性。

游戏中的圣物可以提供丰富的被动效果，例如每次刷新技能后，对周围敌人造成伤害；每次释放技能后，可以释放闪电队敌人造成伤害。根据随机拾取的圣物不同，对玩家的战斗风格能带来非常大的影响。玩家如何在随机的圣物里，选取更适合的圣物，组建理想的战斗流派，则需要运气和决策了。

每轮游戏结束，都会结算奖励。根据击杀敌人数、已造成伤害量、已承受伤害量，来结算余烬的奖励。数据越好，余烬也就越多。游戏鼓励玩家多走位，多造成伤害。余烬可以用来解锁被动效果，例如额外生命值、伤害加成等，充分保证了局外的成长收益，让玩家能越战越强。

除了余烬之外，玩家在冒险过程中，还会拾取各种未鉴定的圣物宝珠。当玩家死亡后，就可以找长老鉴定。圣物宝珠有着不同等级之分，越是强力的宝珠越是作用强大，能让下一次战斗变得更加轻松。

游戏包含单手剑、长弓、法杖、战锤、投掷镰刀、巨刀六种武器。除了初始的单手剑之外，其他五种武器都需要余烬来解锁。而且，玩家在不断使用武器的过程中，可以积攒熟练度。当玩家熟练掌握一种之后，可以得到额外的加成。

游戏最大的亮点在于支持多人玩家，允许一到四名玩家联机游戏。和朋友一起，不断闯关的过程，真是十分欢乐。只可惜游戏没有匹配模式，对于社恐来说，是有一点点不友好。

我们是一群游戏爱好者，希望能用评测来帮助大家认识更多好游戏，期待您的同行！ [/code]
[/h1]

142770678.review:
Ember Knights is an action Roguelite that surprised me with its quality in both single-player and multiplayer modes. It follows the adventures of Ember Knights, warriors defending the universe from the evil sorcerer Praxis. The gameplay is reminiscent of Castle Crashers and Gauntlet, with randomly generated maps and challenging enemies. You collect coins and Ember to unlock upgrades and weapons, making each run more manageable. The game's currency system adds depth to the gameplay, and the Ember Tree allows for permanent character upgrades. The combat is fun and exciting, and the game's replayability is impressive.

The art style is charming, and the universe is interesting. Overall, Ember Knights is a top-notch game and has become one of my favorite releases this year. Its a game I'll definitely be revisiting with friends for years to come.

142768246.review: Doom Turtle have done an incredible job at creating a rogue-lite game that feels great!  My brother and I have plenty of hours in it (with many more to come). Still more secrets to discover, more combinations to try, and more boss variations to conquer. Super fun!

142766041.review:
A surprisingly fun co-op focused roguelike action game. It has its ups and downs, but it's definitely worth a buy if you've got someone to play with!

+++Pros+++
+Solid pixel art style with expressive characters and enemies. Everything is well telegraphed because of how clear the animations are.
+Very clearly designed for multiplayer. It accounts for sharing resources, letting you make tons of microdecisions and feels like working together towards a goal.
+Controls are very tight and satisfying. Pulling off combos with your skills or friends is a lot of fun.
+Excellent sound design, especially sound effects.

---Cons---
-Singleplayer is not nearly as fun. The game is a lot trickier unless you know which relics lead you to broken builds that make the game too easy. Difficulty is not balanced for one player.
-The story is incredibly generic and boring. No big surprises, no interesting characters. I basically skip through every text box.

The cons aren't really that big a deal, in my opinion. The gameplay is fun and that's really all you need. It's not "Best in genre" but it's quite good, especially with friends. 8.5/10

In my opinion? Actually a 10/10 game for what it is. What an impression its left me in just 4 hours.

142709606.review:
I really like this game. The character's are very snappy and responsive, which I believe is important for any good rogue-lite where the goal is to not be hit. The weapons feel unique. The environments are decently varied. There are quite a few builds and you have a fairly consistent method of making a build once you start getting more unlocks. 
My only problem is that, sometimes in multiplayer it feels easy to lose sight of your character. Other player's effects can just be so distracting that it becomes hard to see the dangerous things the enemies are doing. Oh also, any player effect that causes knockback is incredibly frustrating for everyone else as they just zip around effectively kidnapping an enemy you were fighting and denying you on kill effects or charges to abilites. Super annoying and there's nothing to be done about it because they're just playing the game.
The game plays fine in solo, but is definitely less fun that way. Be social and make a few friends in groups or bring your own to find out what's really fun about this game.

142700703.review: 组队要是可以跟队友换物资就好了

142694998.review:
見下ろし型のローグライクアクション。
頭が炎の騎士「エンバーナイト」を操って戦う。
コントローラー前提の作り(タイトル画面に記載あり)で、
操作性やレスポンスはかなり良いように思う。
最大4人でのオンラインマルチに対応しているほか、
リモプレトゥギャザーにも対応、こちらも4人までOK。

〇良い点
・ドット絵がかなり高レベル。
　エンバーナイトはSD体形でかわいくも格好良く、
　敵や地形の書き込みも凄まじい。
・敵が攻撃する際は頭上に！が表示されたり、
　攻撃エリアが赤くなったりして分かりやすい。
・アクションが攻撃、回避、スキル2つと簡単。
・ローグライクアクションとして非常に堅実な作り。
・回避の性能が良い。動作中は無敵らしく、硬直が短い。
・溝や穴に絶対に落ちない。回避アクションをしても同様。
　回避で飛び越えられるかどうかを自動判定してくれる。
・ゲーム進行のテンポが良い。
・キャラがエンバーナイトだけ、メイン武器が全6種だが、
　選んだ武器によってステータスも変わるので実質6キャラ。
　武器によってエンバーナイトの見た目も変わる。
　また、武器強化システムも用意されている。
・永続強化要素があるが、解放しただけで終わりではなく、
　いくつかから効果を選べる仕様になっている。
　例：HP関連は①最大値を増やしてスタート、
　　　②部屋をクリアすると少し回復するようになる、
　　　③中ボスやボスを倒すと最大値が増える、から選ぶ。
　永続強化はやり尽くしたら終わりという作品が多いので、
　これは差別化になっていると言える。
・武器強化システムも永続強化と同様、
　1つのツリーにつき3つの中から1つ選ぶ形式。
　ツリーは3つあり、それぞれ1つ選べる。選び直し可能。
・回復アイテムの効果が低いが、
　一工夫することで効果を上げたり、
　全く別の効果を持たせたりできる。
　例：肉・リンゴ→炎スキルで焼くと効果アップ。
　　　焼いたリンゴはさらに攻撃で4つに分割できる。
・属性攻撃が効果発動のトリガーになる装備品は、
　その属性攻撃を行える状態でないと出現しない。
　目指すビルドに不要なアイテムを取らないことで
　特化ビルドを完成させやすくなるため、
　アイテムを取らないことにも利点が生まれている。

〇武器紹介
1.剣：素早い横振りで攻撃する近接武器。
2.弓：チャージショットで貫通弾を撃てる飛び道具。
3.杖：中距離武器。武器性能はショボいがスキル補正が高く、
　　　最初からスキルを1つ持って始まる。
4.槌：3段攻撃全てでチャージが行えるパワータイプの武器。
　　　攻撃モーションが長く回避に移行しにくい。
5.手裏剣：近接武器。チャージでブーメランのように投げる。
　　　　　チャージ攻撃を当てると通常攻撃が強化される。
6.鎌：剣よりちょっと長い近接武器。コンボタイプ。
　　　攻撃性能が高いが、近接型なのに低HP。

〇アレな点
・ゲームスピードがちょっと速めなので、
　ソロプレイだと一部の溜め攻撃が使いにくいかも。

・ちょいちょい日本語が分かりにくかったりする。
　大部分は問題ないし、翻訳あるだけ良いけど。

・回避が優秀だからなのだろうが、
　やっぱり回復アイテムの出が渋すぎるかなと思う。
　効果を上げられるにしても方法がかなり限定的なので、
　あまりそれをアテにできないということもある。
　後半になると被弾1回のダメージも大きいし…。

・永続強化要素の効果があまり高くなく、
　ゲーム自体が相当上手くならないと辛い。

・運次第だが、ステージが進んでも攻撃力があまり上がらず、
　必然的にボタンを連打することになって疲れる。
　チャージ攻撃を多用しようにもチャンスがあまりない。

・ボス戦中に壁の近くで戦っていた時、一度だけ壁にハマった。
　出られなくなったが、仲間がボスを倒してくれたため
　勝利後決めポーズの強制位置変更で脱出することができた。

堅実な作りながら工夫も見て取れる良質な作品。オススメ。

142685306.review:
모든 업적 100% 올클리어 후 리뷰 재작성

무기는 무조건 활이 최고다. 활 퍽중에 다섯발쏘는 퍽 있는데 무조건 그거해라
활이 공속도 빠르고 사거리도 넓은데 다섯발쏘게되면 3타 나가는 순간 스킬 쿨다운이 사라져버린다. 활이 초반에는 딜도 약하고 쥰내 애매한 붕신무기지만 유물 좀 채워지는 순간 괴물로 변한다.
스킬쓰면 2초동안 무적되는 목걸이 유물 있는데 그거 먹는 순간 구르기없이 최고난이도 진보스하고 키스하면서 맞다이 가능하다

만약 퍽 해금이 아직 잘 안됐으면 낫 골라라
낫은 저점이 쥰내높다. 차징샷맞추면 크리가 쥰내 잘뜨니까 크리템 대충 맞춰놓으면 밥값은 하는 무기다.

그리고 속성은 다 괜찮으니 아무거나 해도 되는데
개인적으로 보스전 1v1은 독이 최고같은데 독이 코어가 쥰내많아서 빌드 완성시키기 사실상 힘드니까 독 말고 벼락속성으로 골라라. 토르망치 얻는순간 사이클론으로 모아놓고 벼락 한발 떨구면 토르망치가 몹들 머리위로 비오듯 떨어지는데 몹 사라진다.
보스전에서도 좋은데 활을 골랐다면 스킬을 쿨다운이 없다시피 해서 스킬을 난사할수 있는데 스킬 사용시 벼락떨구는 유물이 있다면 보스도 녹이는 전천후 만능빌드다.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

최고단계 클리어 - 진엔딩 보고 다시 리뷰 작성

난이도가 많이 어렵지 않고 적당함. 입문하기에 좋은 로그라이크 게임.
최대 4인까지 지원하기에 친구들과 다같이 하기에 이만한 게임이 없음.
다만 멀티 게임시 해금되는 요소는 호스트에게만 해금되니
참가한 사람들은 나중에 따로 해금해야함

무기의 밸런스도 잘 맞는 편이라고 생각함.
한번 회차를 돌면 무기하고 상점이 해금되는데
상점 리세마라 가능하니 최고단계 갈때는 리세마라 돌리면 세팅하기 편함
*게임이 어려운 사람은 독 빌드 올려보셈 바로 클리어각 나옴*

다만 스킬의 종류가 좀 적은감이 있음. 스킬좀 많이 생기면 좋을듯

무기는 사람마다 취향이 다른듯. 원거리가 좋다는 사람이 있고 근거리가 좋다는 사람이 있음. 한마디로 무기 밸런스 좋다는 거임. 자기 손에 맞는거 하셈.

아래는 내 기준 주관적인 무기리뷰임

검 - 초반부터 후반까지 특별히 좋은거, 나쁜거 없이 무난함. 그러나 롤찌(구르기-찌르기)가 쥰내 스무스하고 조작감도 좋아서 이게 국밥스킬임. 초반에 유물없고 스킬없을때 롤찌 하나면 든든함
장점: 롤찌
단점: 쥰내 무난하고 특색이 없음

활 - 원거리에서 싸우기에 안전하고 독 빌드 올리면 괴물됨. 나중에 무기 퍽 해금하면 3타가 가장 다양하게 변해서 재밌음. 다만 공격이 효율이 낮아서 첨에 뭣도모르고 공격올렸는데 후반에 딜이 안나와서 피똥쌌음. 활은 화염, 얼음, 독 이런 상태이상빌드로 딜뽑는거임. 평타 아무리 올려도 딜 안나옴.
장점: 원거리인데 공속도 빠르고 선후딜도 적어서 생존력 좋음
단점: 유물 의존도가 심함.

지팡이 - 사나이는 마법같은 계집무기 안씀
장점: 없음
단점: 계집무기, 복장도 못생김

해머 - 디버프+한방딜 무기. 보스를 5초정도 약화시킬 수 있고 땅에 지진같은거 일으키는데 그 위에 몬스터있으면 스킬 쿨이 쥰내 빨리 줄어듦. 보스랑 맞다이 가능함. 다만 초반에 무기 퍽 해금 안됐으면 선딜 쥰내길고 딜은 안나오는 애매한 붕신무기이므로 회차 한번이상 끝내고 퍽 해금하고 사용할 것.
장점: 보스랑 맞딜해도 이김
단점: 맞딜하려면 재 모아서 무기 퍽 해금 많이해야함

수리검 - 차징샷으로 몹을 때려 자신에게 버프걸거나 상대에게 디버프 걸고 싸우는 치명타 위주의 무기. 특히 3타에 묻어나오는 퍽이 강력함. 다른 무기에 비해 비교적 초반이 수월함. 수리검 차징해서 던지면 수리검이랑 캐릭터랑 위치를 스왑할 수 있는데 크게 쓸모가없음. 후반가면 무기가 특출난게 없는 애매한 무기가 돼버림. 이유는 다음 무기인 낫에서 설명.
장점: 3번째 공격에 묻어나오는 퍽이 좋아서 초반이 수월함
단점: 차징안하면 사거리가 쥰내짧음. 근거리 무기랑 다를바 없음

낫 - 3타를 치면 스택이 쌓이고 3스택이 쌓이면 검기를 날림. 검기의 효과는 치명타율을 높이거나 상대를 끌고오거나 상대를 얼릴수 있는데 여기서 치명타율 높이는 퍽으로 하면 진짜 모든 보스하고 맞딜 가능. 위에 나온 수리검과 같이 몬스터에게 디버프걸고 디버프 유지하면서 싸우는 무기인데 범위도 넓어서 잡몹도 잘잡고 디버프 효과가 좋아서 보스도 잘잡음. 개인적으로 씹사기무기라고 생각함. 회복률 +2 올리는 퍽 들고 피흡세팅 맞추고 독빌드 타면 딜은 딜대로 나오고 피는 피대로 참. 회복룰+2 퍽때문에 좀비세팅 맞추기가 아주 편함. 리세마라로 치명타시 회복해주는 글러브만 첨에 먹고 시작하면 유물이 ㅈ같이 뜨지 않는이상 회차는 가볍게 돔. 유물 좀 잘 뜨면 보스랑 이마 맞대고 서로 일기토할수있음
장점: 무기중 제일 사기무기. 무기 범위도 쥰내 넓어서 대충 휘둘러도 뒤에있는 몹까지 팰수있음
단점: 조작감이 초반에 붕신같아서 적응해야함

주관적인 리뷰니까 참고만 하셈

아주 재밌었고 추천함. 친구가 있다면 강추!

142653979.review:
A fun co-op experience but quite shallow as a rogue-lite. 6/10

If you're looking for a co-op experience, this is great. If you're a solo looking for a solid rogue-lite, this is fine but isn't quite there yet. Its short, poorly balanced, and lack replayability. I'm sure it's just v1.0 awkwardness. A lot of other great rogue-lites also had this problem.

The Good:
- Co-op rogue-lites are great and there should be more of them. This aspect carries the game.

The Meh:
- There's nothing really driving me to come back and play more. You can 100% the game really quickly and there isn't a system that rewards replaying the game beyond that point.

- Unlocks are hidden solely behind number of enemies killed which makes sense for a co-op game but is a bit boring.

The Bad;
- Items and weapons are poorly balanced. You get a sense of what's good and what's terrible really quickly.

- Lack in play-style diversity. Almost every weapon has a charge attack, but most items don't work with charge attacks at all. So builds either boil down to heavy skill usage or just spamming the attack button. It completely removes the nuances between the different weapons because you're better off just spamming attack and not thinking about gimmicks that don't work or punish you for trying them.

- There's a system that lets you spend in-game resources to RNG your way into perfect starting items. Its quite easy to farm for said resource and it trivializes the game because you can just pick the best 4 items to start with for any given build.

142618289.review:
It's multiplayer Hades. If you don't know, Hades is a fantastic hack 'n slash roguelite dungeon crawler that set the bar for the genre a few years back. Ember Knights is extremely similar to Hades, in fact it has some nearly identical mechanics. The weapons are very similar, the room-based pick-your-next-reward system is practically identical, relics power up your existing abilities just like boons, you eventually unlock an intricate & modular difficulty customization system...I could keep going, but I think I've made my point.

Not that this is bad that Ember Knights practically ripped off Hades' formula, by any means. The fact that it's multiplayer where Hades wasn't, and yet it replicates the satisfying gameplay of Hades without much sacrifice (other than the story, but you typically don't play multiplayer games like this for the story), is a big selling point. Definitely better with friends, there's a lot of fun to be had in partying up and working together here.

The pixel art looks great, the weapons all feel satisfying to use (and they seem to strike a good balance between satisfying VFX and not clogging up your screen with explosions, which is something Hades struggled with. Very important when there can be up to 4 of you swinging swords at once), and there's a good amount of extras and upgrades to unlock between runs. Worth the price, in my opinion, on or off sale.

142613235.review:
4 Player Hades

Great multiplayer/solo rouge-lite that is up there on the difficulty scale. Way harder than Hades and many other rouge likes However, at the same time, I would recommend this rouge-lite for anyone new the genre, specifically because it is multiplayer, and the multiplayer works quite well!


The Good Things

- Excellent multiplayer. Players can play on their game or with others and group up later. Everything connects and works seamlessly.

- a TON of build diversity. Stack poison, cause things to explode and chain the poison element to others; throw chakrams that freeze targets when hit, that chains to a ton of other enemies with a 100% critical chance against frozen targets; or wield a sword that has 100% burn chance on enemies, while above 75% health, which brings a ton of builds online, but be careful to not get hit to much!

- Charming little story, with a pleasing art style. Nothing crazy here, just visually pleasing. Most of the cut scenes in this game are actually on the latter half of the game to reward the player for getting this far. Which is a nice touch. 

- Game play is top notch. If you exclude all the abilities and just focus on the weapons alone, there could be enough here to roast some marsh mellows and them some. 


The Bad Things

- Super lack of healing items in this game, especially when it is needed, like before a certain boss. If you don't build into healing for your build, you will gradually run out of healing until you become cinder for the ember gods. The counter to this, is that in multiplayer there are many different ways to revive your multiplayer buddies in case they hit the dust, but not everybody plays multiplayer.

142596294.review:
This is a frustrating review to write.  The game, in a vacuum, is amazing.  Visually gorgeous, simple and fluid action mixed with complex engaging encounters, compelling game-play that makes you want to try just one more run every time, technically fluid, and a definite love for gaming poured into development.  

But there just lacks content for a genre that requires a breadth of content to excel.  Games like this, built to be played over and over again in bursts, requires FAR more diversity than this offers.  Which is incredibly frustrating because at its core there is potential to be on the mount everest of stellar indie titles here.  So much potential.  But after sitting in early access for a year and a half, for a game as glowingly praised through development as it was, Ember Knights just doesn't have a shred of the diversity that makes other games of the genre stick out so much. I was going to grab this game when it first hit early access but having an unhealthy amount of hours into the action roguelike genre I knew that in order to really enjoy it I would have to wait for more meat on the bone.  Dead Cells, for example, was always a fundamentally phenomenal experience but you definitely needed to wait till it was fleshed out to experience what makes it so iconic. I honestly am surprised at the lack of content here.  So much so that I felt compelled to write a rare review.   

There are only a small handful of enemies per world, maybe 4-5?  And at 5 worlds thats really, save for a few rare encounters, 25 enemies you're going to see all game.  After just a few runs the first worlds feel more cumbersome than enjoyable.  17 abilities and 6 weapons doesn't sound incredibly lack luster but it also doesn't bring a lot to the table.  And truthfully many of the abilities feel same-y enough that they aren't going to change your gameplay.  Its close though, its close!!  I feel like some tweeking to the abilities and weapons could make them feel different enough but even then my criticism is the breadth of it all.  There's just not enough.  You can pretty much bank on getting whatever ability you want pretty immediately and takes away from the whole feeling of needing to work with what you find.


When playing games like this, Hades, Dead Cells, Curse of the Dead Gods, Undermine, Gunfire Reborn, or honestly any of the rouglike's with heavy meta-progression, the appeal is in "ooooo what will this run be like!".  At the time of writing this, most runs are going to feel very very same-y in Ember Knights.  I eagerly wait the content to merit changing this review, but for a game i was so hyped to finally play I am notably disappointed.

A história é muito básica, bem clichê, salvar a árvore da vida de um vilão qualquer.

Bought this to scratch the Hades itch while waiting for the sequel, but the loading time when starting a run on Steam Deck (512GB) is long enough to make playing it a chore for me.  It takes about 30-45 seconds for the world to load when first starting a run, and while I had hoped this just a first run load time and subsequent runs would be a little quicker, that didn't end up happening.  Each run took the same amount of time to load before I could get back to playing.  With so many other games in this vein I play on my Steam Deck (Hades, Dead Cells, Warm Snow, Astral Ascent, Rogue Legacy (1&2), Wizard of Legend, etc.) that just flow better, it was just jarring when really trying to get into this game.

While it's a thumbs down for me right now, I can definitely see why it's pretty highly reviewed.  Pixel art is great, controls are pretty tight, sound/music works for everything, seems like progression and skills would have offered a good variety to runs, but that load time each run on my Steam Deck just sucks all the fun there could be for me since everything just comes to such a grinding halt.

Maybe it'll get more optimized for Steam Deck in the future, and if it does I'd have no issue buying it again.

142553892.review:
This game is okay through the third area. Up through that point, I didn't see the game too badly falling into the trap this category of game tends to, where it just sort of screws over the single player side of the game by being too multiplayer focused at its core. Up to that point the worst thing is that some base weapon forms are clearly not tuned to single player at all (see: the staff with a cone AoE that is all but unusable without a second player to help position). The fourth area though is an absolute mess of game design. Enemies that shoot at you, chase you down with wide range slam attacks, use massive sword beams, and activate environmental conditions that it's not even remotely intuitive as to how you're supposed to handle them. The enemy groups don't seem to have any thought put into them, and the fourth area just screams "have more sentient individuals to do aggro management".

It's the same problem I've seen repeated over and over and over again in this game type, and I guess thanks to Ember Knights for making sure this is the last one of its type I ever purchase.
